item.title: Scope in JavaScript
item.description: I am learning JS for work. This is a pretty good summary of the most common scoping rules in JavaScript: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/500431/what-is-the-scope-of-variables-in-javascript
item.content:encoded:
I am learning JS for work. This is a pretty good summary of the most common scoping rules in JavaScript:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/500431/what-is-the-scope-of-variables-in-javascript
